title: Sri Lanka to get 15 more Bailey Bridges from India to connect Cyclone hit highways
byline: Projects in other areas will also be launched in the coming days

title: Sri Lanka private credit surges to new high of Rs262bn in November
byline: Net credit to government from banks fell by Rs103bn to Rs6,262bn in November 2025

title: Sri Lanka's China-backed Hambantota Port eyes 2mn box capacity after 700-pct growth
byline: HIP handled 8.24 million metric tonnes of cargo in 2025, up 175 percent from 3.0 million metric tonnes
